channel.title: Need help with mining timer[474]

item.title: Need help with mining timer[474]
item.dc:creator: @baspwnzz baspwnzz
item.description:
@baspwnzz wrote:

i have essence mines working but now if u click mine u get 28 essences in just one click instead of like one by one every 3 seconds this is my script

  while (freeSlots() > 0 && freeSlots() <= 28) {
    addItem(1436, 1);
  }
  if (freeSlots() >= 28) {
    sM("You inventory is full!");

}
break;

Read full topic
